ingredients.ingredient: bsp refried pinto beans approx or a little more - or refried black beans
mexican chorizo approx - if in the casing remove from casing
bolillo roll or telera/small baguette-style roll
bsp cotija cheese approx - or use another mexican cheese like oaxaca
optional additions a few slices of avocado some shredded lettuce pickled red onion slices
bsp lard bacon fat or butter
b pork shoulder or butt well marbled with fat cut into large chunks roughly 4 inch
mexican crema or sour cream optional for topping
avocado red onions cilantro optional for topping
ooked black beans or refried beans optional for serving
bs yukon gold potatoes cut into 1/4 inch cubes
ears of sweetcorn shucked and cleaned of silk
bsp lime juice about 1 large lime juiced
mixed vegetables peas corn diced carrots
heavy cream or half and half
dried ancho chilies seeded and stems removed
omato diced and drained roughly 1 c
jalapeno pepper seeded de-veined and diced
packed brown sugar or grated piloncillo
oaf french bread sliced 1/2 inch thick
raisins or dried fruit of choice
cotija or queso fresco cheese or shredded monterey jack or muenster
grated  piloncillo  or brown sugar more if desired
mini buns palm size around 12cm/45 inches in length or 2 baguettes around 20cm/8 inches in length
arge onion or 1/2 of a small/medium onion finely chopped
b ground beef 80 - dont use lean for this
scotch bonnet pepper habanero is a good substitute
scotch bonnet pepper habanero pepper chopped
arge fresh tomatoes or 1 and 1/2 cans of tomato chopped
seasoning cube/bouillon cube or salt to taste
up mixed carrots and peas thawed if frozen or fresh
a round of parchment paper that fits inside your cooking pot see step 11
easpoon chili powder or to taste
finely chopped almonds or other nut of choice
roughly 1/2 cup pitted medjool dates other dates can also be used
1/2 cup powdered sugar / icing sugar for dusting
o 1 scotch bonnet pepper or habanero pepper to taste
evel teaspoon salt flaked sea salt
s oil use red palm oil/dende oil for an authentic taste
scotch bonnet peppers or habanero chiles optional if you like heat
s of tiger prawns or extra large shrimp
fillets of smoked fish like cod or mackerel optional
fish crayfish or chicken stock seasoning cube or use stock rather than water
grated fresh ginger or 1/4 tsp ground dry
bsp mrs balls chutney or other peach and/or apricot chutney
white crustless bread soaked in milk as needed to moisten
bsp double cream or heavy cream optional
d almonds to sprinkle on top
bay leaves citrus leaves to top
hicken leg quarters	 or 8 chicken legs
red chili flakes optional if your chutney isn’t already spicy
330 g sweet corn kernels thawed if frozen cut off of the cob if fresh divided
b beef roast top round roast or brisket trimmed of sinew
b fatty pork shoulder/butt or pork neck or belly
cayenne depending on your heat preference
a pinch saffron soaked in lukewarm water optional
round warqa sheets palm sized or a bit larger always have a few spare ones in hand in case you need more layers of warqa to seal the pastilla
vegetable oil to oil the folding surface
larified butter to brush the warqa with
egg white to close off the edges of the warqa
handful of chopped cilantro for garnish
